# Some stuff about me

* I am a data scientist and statistician with five years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry, and an academic background in computational physics.
* I enjoy working in collaborative environments on hard problems with modern technologies and methods.

# Education

```{r}
tribble(
  ~Degree, ~Year, ~Institution, ~Where,
  "MSc Physics", "2014-2016", "Dalhousie University", "Halifax, NS",
  "BSc Physics, Honours", "2009-2014", "University of Prince Edward Island", "Charlottetown, PE"
) %>% 
  detailed_entries(Degree, Year, Institution, Where)
```

# Experience

```{r}
tribble(
  ~Year, ~Position, ~Description,
  c("2017-"), "Biostatistician", "Worked on global clincal trials and patient-centered research across multiple disease areas.",
  c("2015-2016"), "Teaching Assistant", "Course: Introduction to Numerical Programming"
) %>% 
  brief_entries(
    Year, Position, Description
  )
```

# Projects

```{r}
tribble(
  ~ project, ~ year, ~ description, ~ link, ~ test,
  "Canadian COVID-19 dashboard", "2021", "A dashboard built in Shiny that reports and visualizes the latest COVID-19 numbers in Canada.", "https://taylor-dunn.shinyapps.io/canadacovidshiny/", "test",
  "Canadian COVID-19 dashboard", "2021", "A dashboard built in Shiny that reports and visualizes the latest COVID-19 numbers in Canada.", "https://github.com/taylordunn/gasr", "test"
) %>%
  detailed_entries(
    with = project, where = link, why = description,
    what = NA, when = NA,
    .protect = FALSE
  )
```

# Test

```{r}
tibble::tribble(
  ~what,
  "\\color{blue}test in blue",
  "\\href{www.google.com}{www.google.com}",
  "\\href{https://github.com/taylordunn/gasr}{gasr package}",
  "\\color{awesome-pink}\\href{https://github.com/taylordunn/gasr}{gasr package}",
  "\\color{awesome-skyblue}\\href{https://github.com/taylordunn/gasr}{gasr package}",
  "\\color{awesome-emerald}\\href{https://github.com/taylordunn/gasr}{gasr package}",
  "\\color{tdunn-green}\\href{https://github.com/taylordunn/gasr}{gasr package}",
  "\\color{tdunn-red}\\href{https://github.com/taylordunn/gasr}{gasr package}"
) %>%
  detailed_entries(
    what = what,
    .protect = FALSE
  )
```


# Brief test

```{r}
tribble(
  ~ what, ~ when, ~ with,
  "what", "when", "with",
  "\\color{tdunn-red}\\href{https://github.com/taylordunn/gasr}{gasr package}",
  "\\color{tdunn-blue}\\href{https://github.com/taylordunn/gasr}{gasr package}",
  "\\color{tdunn-green}\\href{https://github.com/taylordunn/gasr}{gasr package}"
) %>%
  brief_entries(what, when, with, .protect = FALSE)
```

# Detailed test

```{r}
tribble(

```
